### **Selected Publications**

- [The value of group purchasing: Evidence from the U.S. hospital industry](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0047272725000787?via%3Dihub), with [Yanhao Wang](yanhaowang.com), _Journal of Public Economic_, 247, 2025.

- *Outside equity and healthcare firm behavior*, with Elizabeth Munnich, Michael Richards, Chris Whaley, and Xiaoxi Zhao, _Journal of Health Economics_, 91, 2023.

- [Multimarket contact in Medicare Advantage](https://www.nber.org/papers/w24486), with Ian McCarthy, _Journal of Industrial Economics_, 71(1), 212–255, 2023.

- [Information technology and patient health: Analyzing outcomes, populations, and mechanisms](http://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=2445431), with Seth Freedman and Jeffrey Prince, _American Journal of Health Economics_, 4(1), 51–79, 2018.

- [Quality choice and market structure: A dynamic analysis of nursing home oligopolies](http://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=2041704), _International Economic Review_, 56(4), 1261–1290, 2015.

- [Public health insurance expansions and hospital technology adoption](http://www.nber.org/papers/w20159), with Seth Freedman and Kosali Simon, _Journal of Public Economics_, 121, 117–131, 2015.

- [Revisiting the relationship between nurse staffing and quality of care in nursing homes: An instrumental variables approach](http://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=2427821), _Journal of Health Economics_, 37, 13–24, 2014.

- [The impact of the partnership long-term care insurance program on private coverage](http://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=2039059), with Jeffrey Prince, _Journal of Health Economics_, 32(6), 1205–1213, 2013.
